organization.title: The club
content: Welcome to the official website of the association Année Japon (Japan Year)!

Created on the occasion of “The year of Japan in France” in 1997, we propose to the inhabitants of Grenoble that are passionate about Japan ans to the Japanese people living in Grenoble to meet together to encourage cultural exchange.
If you wish to speak in French or Japanese, feel free to join us, you are all welcome!

group-fb.title: Meeting us
content: To meet us or just to ask questions, please join us on Facebook!
Just fill in the three questions and you will be part of the group ;-)

We also plan warm weekly meetings, cinema outings related to Japan, restaurant outings to discuss around a bowl of ramen noodle or even barbecue events to share together our love for French and Japanese cuisine!

activity.title: Our activities
content: Japanese interns and students welcoming in Grenoble
Bilateral translation of French, English and Japanese documents
Making of a French-Japanese radio station

Various seminars:
on the analysis of society from the point of view of cognitive science,
the numeric humanities and the international law,
diseases of speech disorders
